name: Friedemann Mattern
content: Homepage Friedemann Mattern Prof. Friedemann Mattern Department of Computer Science ETH Zurich Universitätstrasse 6 CH-8092 Zurich Switzerland E-mail: mattern@inf.ethz.ch Web: people.inf.ethz.ch/mattern/ From 1999 to 2020 Friedemann Mattern led the distributed systems research group at the department of computer science of ETH Zurich. His research interests encompass models and concepts for distributed computations, distributed systems, ubiquitous computing, sensor networks, and the Internet of Things. See also: Curriculum Vitae | Publications | Lectures | Research Group ETH Zurich | Computer  Science | Distributed Systems Last modified: May 28, 2024 -- fm
